recommendations: Matthew Rauls
Technical Product Manager at Akimeka
July 10, 2016, Matthew managed Jonathan directly

Jonathan is a key member of the development team that built a blood product management application for the DoD that worked on mobile devices, the web and as a standalone Windows app. Jonathan is the rare technician who operates at a senior technical level, yet is also perfectly comfortable interacting with the customer and both technical and non-technical team members. He is a natural leader, well-liked by all. He is a hard worker and doer, not a talker - whatever he doesn't know he goes out and acquires the knowledge to execute. I would unreservedly recommend Jonathan for any senior technical or technical management position.

Deborah Oakes
Realtor
March 15, 2016, Jonathan was a client of Deborah’s

When Deborah represented us as buyers, and later as sellers, we always knew Deborah's primary interest was to ensure we found the right home, and later to sell it for the right price. She walked us through dozens of homes, and even though it took us months to find a home that was just right for our family, we never felt rushed or pressured into buying. Deborah provided her open and honest, professional opinion about each property we looked at. Deborah worked with us continuously, until we found the home that was perfect for our family. Based on our previous experience, we knew Deborah would be an excellent representative for us during for the sale of our home. Deborah was always willing to go above and beyond to make sure the buying/sales process went as smoothly as possible. She was willing to work after hours to ensure all the necessary documents and forms were correctly filled out, and that we didn't miss any deadlines. Deborah provided clear descriptions for any questions we had during the sales process. In every one of our interactions, Deborah always acted with patience, care, knowledge, and professionalism.  When selling our home, Deborah exuded expertise throughout the entire sales process. She provided an excellent pricing strategy that fit our sales timeline. Deborah always provided valuable council whenever we had questions regarding the sales contract, or sales process. Deborah made the entire sales process as painless as possible. We never felt rushed, and always knew Deborah had our best interests at heart.I would recommend that anyone who is looking to purchase or sell a home in CO use Deborah Oakes as their realtor.  Highest recommendation!
Deborah Oakes

summary: Jonathan has 10+ years professional experience as a Software Engineer. He has worked on multiple efforts, spanning both multi-million dollar solutions involving 120+ member engineering teams consisting of hardware, software, and systems engineers, as well as startup projects with tight budgets and deadlines.   Jonathan earned a Master of Science - Computer Science degree from Colorado Technical University. He earned his undergraduate degree in Computer Science from TUI University with Summa Cum Laude honors. He is passionate about STEM, Science, Math, Computer Science, AI, and the Software Engineering discipline, considering it more than just a career. He currently holds the Xamarin Certified Mobile Developer certification, and is actively pursuing the Professional Software Engineering Master Certification from the IEEE Computer Society.Interests:- Algorithms analysis, design, and implementation- Full Stack Enterprise, Cloud, Web, and Mobile applications development- Programming for Scientific and Engineering applications- AI/Computational Intelligence research, development, and application- Science, Space, and Defense applications of Computer ScienceAffiliations:- Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) Professional Member- IEEE Computer Society Member- IEEE Computational Intelligence Society Member- IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Society Member- Association for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence (AAAI) Member- F# Software Foundation Sustaining Member
